context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

appeal to the pharmaceutical company, or the hospital, for help or a discount
seek assistance from different organizations or charities that help with medical expenses

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh could do is to
generation: call a taxi, an Uber, or a friend to pick him up and drive him to the airport

flag down a passing taxi or use a ride share application on his phone to book a ride to the airport
call a taxi, rideshare service, or towing service to help him get his car off the road and get him to the airport
call a taxi, an Uber, or other ride-sharing service to continue his journey to the airport

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. immediately call or message her mom and ask her to bring the assignment to school

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.

generation: build a shelter to protect against the elements, use a mirror or any shiny object to signal for help during the day, light a fire at night which can be visible from a distance and would also keep them warm
create a signal for help
start a fire for warmth

try and find shelter, possibly in a cave or by constructing a makeshift shelter from branches and foliage

hunt for some animals or look for wildlife to catch and eat
start rationing the remaining food and water supplies
